001package com.technototes.library.general;
002
003/**
004 * Interface for anything that can be inverted
005 *
006 * @author Alex Stedman
007 */
008@SuppressWarnings("unused")
009public interface Invertable<T extends Invertable<T>> {
010    /**
011     * Set the inversion (true -> Is inverted, false -> Not inverted)
012     *
013     * @param invert Inversion value
014     * @return this
015     */
016    T setInverted(boolean invert);
017
018    /**
019     * Toggle inversion
020     *
021     * @return this
022     */
023    default T invert() {
024        return setInverted(!getInverted());
025    }
026
027    /**
028     * Get current inversion
029     *
030     * @return Current inversion
031     */
032    boolean getInverted();
033}
